parameters.name: source
parameters.doc: The source URI for the repository

parameters.name: owner
parameters.doc: The user/uid that owns the repository files

parameters.name: group
parameters.doc: The group/gid that owns the repository files

parameters.name: user
parameters.doc: The user to run for repository operations

parameters.name: excludes
parameters.doc: Files to be excluded from the repository

parameters.name: force
parameters.doc: Force repository creation, destroying any files on the path in the process.  Valid values are `true`, `false`.

parameters.name: basic_auth_username
parameters.doc: HTTP Basic Auth username  Requires features basic_auth.

parameters.name: basic_auth_password
parameters.doc: HTTP Basic Auth password  Requires features basic_auth.

parameters.name: identity
parameters.doc: SSH identity file  Requires features ssh_identity.

parameters.name: module
parameters.doc: The repository module to manage  Requires features modules.

parameters.name: remote
parameters.doc: The remote repository to track  Requires features multiple_remotes.

providers.name: bzr
providers.doc:
Supports Bazaar repositories

Required binaries: `bzr`.  Default for `bzr` == `exists`.  Supported features: `reference_tracking`.

providers.name: cvs
providers.doc:
Supports CVS repositories/workspaces

Required binaries: `cvs`.  Default for `cvs` == `exists`.  Supported features: `gzip_compression`, `modules`, `reference_tracking`.

providers.name: git
providers.doc:
Supports Git repositories

Required binaries: `git`, `su`.  Default for `git` == `exists`.  Supported features: `bare_repositories`, `multiple_remotes`, `reference_tracking`, `ssh_identity`, `user`.

providers.name: hg
providers.doc:
Supports Mercurial repositories

Required binaries: `hg`.  Default for `hg` == `exists`.  Supported features: `reference_tracking`.

providers.name: svn
providers.doc:
Supports Subversion repositories

Required binaries: `svn`, `svnadmin`.  Default for `svn` == `exists`.  Supported features: `basic_auth`, `filesystem_types`, `reference_tracking`.

properties.name: revision
properties.doc: The revision of the repository  Values can match `/^\S+$/`.
